name: Orange Ice Cream Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Orange Ice Cream Recipe: Oranges 3 Orange zest 1 Icing sugar 175 gm Double cream 584 milliliters Wafers (to serve) 6
instructions: Squeeze the juice of all 3 oranges and pour into a bowl with the zest and sugar. Stir to dissolve the sugar and add the double cream. Whip everything until it holds soft peaks, and then turn into an air-tight container. Cover and freeze until firm. Serve in a bowl, with wafers.
